caption: Figure 3: Grid search results for MNIST
description: This table presents the results of a grid search on the MNIST dataset for different combinations of learning rate and momentum weight.  The color intensity represents the accuracy, with darker colors indicating lower accuracy and lighter colors higher accuracy.  The best performing combinations are highlighted. The table provides a visual representation of how different hyperparameters affect model performance on the full MNIST dataset.

caption: Figure 3: Grid search results for MNIST
description: This table presents the results of a grid search experiment performed on the MNIST dataset to find optimal hyperparameters for a convolutional neural network.  The experiment varied momentum weight and learning rate, and the table shows the accuracy achieved for each combination.  Lighter colors represent higher accuracy.  Green rectangles highlight the top ten performing combinations, and blue rectangles indicate the best-performing combination(s).
